HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: TD Find Library now has a Custom Filter, where you essentially write C# and filter on anything you want. It lets the search access any C# field or property, and ThingComps like power and fuel levels. Check out some sample custom searches by importing them from Sample Searches in the library. Of course this requires knowledge of game code, but with it, nearly everything is accessible, even mod content. Now, I'm not providing a guide on how to navigate the game's code, because holy cow, is it too big to explain. In short, you should know what you're looking for instead of just browsing the endless possibilities. A lot of the options simply shouldn't be used -- It's a thorough list, not filtered for ease of use.

TD Find Library now has expansion filters AND MORE! - Royalty, including: -- Titles -- Permits -- Psyfocus - Ideology, including: -- Precepts -- Styles -- Gauranlen tree - Biotech, including: -- Mechanitor details -- Xenotype -- Genes - Other filters: -- Abilities (e.g. on cooldown) -- Time to bleed out -- Accessible materials via smelting/surgery/etc -- Prisoner filter has new options -- Grouping can check if "Any 2+" of these filters match -- Relation -- Schedule -- Reserved -- Blighted -- Equipped - Other junk: -- Icons for some filters, which look nice -- Some filters can match "Any" of an entire category so you can now check ANY bionic implant easier
TD Find Library has many new filters since release! - "Assign": outfit, food and drug policies. - Apparel Coverage and Layer - Filters for mods: LTO Groups and Real Fog of War visibilty
